timeline.bodyText: nit: name your test in a way that clarifies what is expected to happen
timeline.author: zohrehj

timeline.bodyText: Do not catch exceptions in tests, instead fail the test with a descriptive message
timeline.author: zohrehj

timeline.bodyText: Can you name this as what it is? rather than what it is not?
timeline.author: zohrehj
zohrehj

timeline.bodyText: nit: what is within range? please use more descriptive names
timeline.author: zohrehj

timeline.bodyText: similar to the one above, please do not catch exceptions in test, instead fail with descriptive failure message.
timeline.author: zohrehj
zohrehj

timeline.bodyText:
shouldn't this be done for all attributes?
if yes, then it would be better to make it into a generic activity update.
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: This update is required only for the activity start time.
replies.author: rohitn-boston

timeline.bodyText: nit: your method seems to be returning a date range, so getDateRange might be a better name.
timeline.author: zohrehj
zohrehj

replies.bodyText: We are using the day, month, year from joiningCalendar, and time is taken from startDate.
replies.author: rohitn-boston

timeline.message: made naming conventions changes and added message of catch block in test cases
Added test cases for testing total, completed and missed runs
